about.contact_text: Have questions? Reach out to us at
about.description: meet.js is Poland's largest and longest-running JavaScript community, bringing together developers and enthusiasts since 2011.
about.get_involved_p1: Whether you're a seasoned developer or just starting your journey with JavaScript, meet.js welcomes you to join our vibrant community.
about.get_involved_p2: Find your local meet.js chapter or check out
about.get_involved_p3: to help grow Poland's most resilient tech community!
about.intro_p1: meet.js is Poland's largest and longest-running JavaScript community, bringing together developers, enthusiasts, and industry experts since 2011.
about.intro_p2: It all began on a Valentine's Day eve in 2011, when a group of JavaScript enthusiasts gathered in a Pozna≈Ñ pub. What started as a casual meetup has evolved into a nationwide movement that has shaped Poland's JavaScript ecosystem.
about.meetup_caption: One of our regular meetups in action
about.title: About meet.js

values.community_driven: 🤝 Community-Driven - Powered by passionate local organizers across Poland
values.free_open: ‚úÖ Free and Open - All our events are free and open to everyone interested in web technologies
values.knowledge_sharing: 💡 Knowledge Sharing - Focus on practical learning and networking opportunities
values.non_commercial: 🚫💰 100% Non-Commercial - We operate without corporate oversight or profit motives

events.no_events: No upcoming events in {city} at the moment.

brand.title: Brand Assets | meet.js
brand.description: Download meet.js brand assets, logos, and wallpapers for your use.
brand.page_subtitle: Download our logos, brand colors, and wallpapers for your projects and presentations.
brand.usage_text: Please use these assets responsibly and in accordance with our brand guidelines. For commercial use or questions about usage, please contact us.
brand.usage_intro: Please use these brand assets responsibly. Here are the key guidelines:
brand.contact_for_questions: For questions about usage or licensing, please contact us at
brand.brand_name_lowercase: Always write "meet.js" with lowercase letters, including the "m" at the beginning.

allowed_list.educational: Educational content and presentations about meet.js
allowed_list.social_media: Social media posts promoting meet.js events
allowed_list.press: Press and media coverage with proper attribution

prohibited_list.misleading: Using in a way that suggests official endorsement
prohibited_list.inappropriate: Association with inappropriate or offensive content

brand.logo_variants_intro: The meet.js logo is available in two main variants: light (official) and bold. Each variant serves different purposes and use cases:
brand.light_logos_description: The official meet.js logo designed for digital use and is the primary logo for meet.js.
brand.light_logos_use_3: Available in SVG and PNG formats
brand.bold_logos_description: Bold variant for prints and places where the official light logo would not be visible enough.
brand.bold_logos_use_4: Available in SVG and PNG formats

empty_events_alert.message: Nothing planned yet. Contact your local organizers if you want to help make it happen!

hero.subtitle: Join the largest JavaScript meetup community in Poland
hero.title: meet.js

join_us.click_city: Click your city to learn how to join your local event as an attendee, speaker or sponsor.
join_us.description: meet.js is a family of local meetups all around Poland. They're for-community and by-community, non-commercial and organized by passionate individuals. Free to attend or for-charity. With the main goal of getting the Web Developers community together and facilitating knowledge exchange and camraderie.
join_us.start_local: If you don't see your city on the map, consider starting a local meet.js!
join_us.title: Join Us

benefits.access: Access to other organizers and their experience
benefits.brand_access: Access to the brand and the social media presence we have
benefits.intro_call: Intro call with Zbyszek with all the knowledge you need to get the first meetup to happen
benefits.network: Exposure to our network, including speakers that might want to visit your city
benefits.sponsor_help: Help when talking to sponsors and venues

organizer.intro_p1: Do you wish to become an organizer and you need some help getting started? That's what we're here for!
organizer.intro_p2: If there's a meet.js in your city already, get in touch with the organizers to see how you can join.
organizer.intro_p3: If your city has a JavaScript crowd that's not organized yet or the local meetups are hosted by companies for short-term commercial or hiring reasons, you should definitely set up a meet.js in your city.
organizer.meta_description: How to become an organizer for meet.js.
organizer.meta_title: How to become an organizer | meet.js

no_benefits.money: Money or anything of notable commercial value

requirements.involvement: Some involvement with JavaScript and programming community (being a dev yourself and enthusiastic about other humans)
requirements.non_commercial: No commercial interest or a company backing your engagement as an organizer
requirements.time: A bit of time and ambition

discounts.meta_description: Exclusive discounts on courses, software tools, and event tickets for the meet.js community.
discounts.subtitle: Exclusive discounts on software tools and event tickets for the meet.js community. Take advantage of these limited-time opportunities!

benefits_card.title: Exclusive Community Benefits
benefits_card.description: As a valued member of the meet.js community, you have access to these special discounts from our partners.

events.title: Events & Conferences
events.description: Special pricing for conferences, workshops, and meetups around the world

software.title: Software & Tools
software.description: Premium developer tools, IDEs, and services at exclusive rates

learning.title: Courses & Learning
learning.description: Discounts on courses, books, and educational content from top instructors

benefits_card.note: All discounts are time-limited and subject to partner terms and conditions. Check expiration dates before redeeming.

events_page.meta_description: All meet.js events in one place.
events_page.subtitle: All meet.js events in one place. Check past and upcoming meetups.
